name: Better Font for Minecraft.tools
description:
Changed the font of the words (except for English) in the preview zone and the result zone.

If the words are not supported by 'minecraftiaregular' (for example Chinese and Japanese), the words will change to use 'Microsoft JhengHei'.
css:
@-moz-document domain("minecraft.tools") {
#result .resultat h3,
#result .methodes,
.tooltipster-content strong,
.give,
.install,
#tooltip,
.page-title .preview_zone,
.page-sign .preview_zone,
.page-sign.preview_zone,
.page-book .preview_zone,
.page-book .preview_zone code,
.page-tellraw .preview_zone code,
.page-tellraw .preview_zone,
.page-motd .preview_zone,
#my-content .ligne .nom,
#my-content .commande,
#shared-content .ligne .nom,
#command-db-list .command .name,
.textarea {
    font-family: 'minecraftiaregular', Microsoft JhengHei !important;
}
}
